sources.title: Unlock the Power of Otter AI: A Beginner's Guide to Transcribing
sources.snippet:
This beginner‚Äôs guide to Otter AI, published on November 17, 2024, explains how to use the transcription tool for meetings through automatic, manual, or file-upload methods. Otter AI's core service, OtterPilot, enables users to link calendar accounts like Google or Microsoft to automatically join, record, and transcribe meetings. Users can also manually initiate recordings or upload audio/video files (e.g., MP3, MP4, WAV) up to 5GB in size for transcription. Detailed instructions are provided for automatic syncing with platforms like Zoom, as well as on starting recordings manually or uploading files directly through the web or mobile apps.

Otter AI offers real-time transcription, meeting summaries, and the ability to manage edited conversations via ‚ÄúMy Conversations.‚Äù It integrates with services like Google Calendar, Zoom, Microsoft Teams, and Slack, and can be used with either a free or premium plan. Overall, Otter AI enhances productivity by simplifying the note-taking process during meetings, using AI tools such as OtterPilot and AI Chat.

citation_mappings.claim_text: Here are the best AI platforms for audio-to-text transcription + summarization suited to short-form projects ‚Äî focusing on speed, accuracy, and getting concise insights quickly: üìå All-in-one Transcription + Summarization Otter.ai ‚Äì real-time transcription, speaker ID, automated meeting summaries and keyword highlights; integrates with Zoom/Teams/Calendar. Strong for meetings and quick uploads. Sonix+1
